includedAssets.title: Day 8: 4:00 P.M. - 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: An eighth day of pulse-pounding action begins. A retired Jack Bauer is unwillingly entangled in an assassination plot against visiting president Omar Hassan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A retired Jack Bauer is unwillingly entangled in an assassination plot against visiting president Omar Hassan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An eighth day of pulse-pounding action begins. A retired Jack Bauer is unwillingly entangled in an assassination plot against visiting president Omar Hassan.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 5:00 P.M. - 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: CTU apprehends a suspect in the thickening assassination plot, but Chloe's convinced they've got the wrong person. Meanwhile, Dana's past returns to haunt her.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU apprehends a suspect in the thickening assassination plot, but Chloe's convinced they've got the wrong person.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: CTU apprehends a suspect in the thickening assassination plot, but Chloe's convinced they've got the wrong person. Meanwhile, Dana's past returns to haunt her.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 6:00 P.M. - 7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack becomes further involved in preventing the assassination attempt. Meanwhile, tension simmers when Dana is reunited with a familiar face from her past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack becomes further involved in preventing the assassination attempt. Meanwhile, tensions simmer when Dana is reunited with a face from her past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack becomes further involved in preventing the assassination attempt. Meanwhile, tension simmers when Dana is reunited with a familiar face from her past.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: In the fallout from the attack, links are made to a Russian cell, and an irrevocably changed Renee resurfaces. Then, Hassan's betrayer meets with his allies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the fallout from the attack, links are made to a Russian cell, and an irrevocably changed Renee resurfaces.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the fallout from the attack, links are made to a Russian cell, and an irrevocably changed Renee resurfaces. Then, Hassan's betrayer meets with his allies.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 8:00 P.M. - 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack reteams with Renee to chase dangerous leads. Then, President Taylor learns of a looming threat that seriously jeopardises the peace accord with Hassan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack reteams with Renee to chase dangerous leads. Then, President Taylor learns of a looming threat that jeopardises the peace accord with Hassan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack reteams with Renee to chase dangerous leads. Then, President Taylor learns of a looming threat that seriously jeopardises the peace accord with Hassan.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 9:00 P.M. - 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Agent Walker confronts her painful past while attempting to broker a deal with a German arms dealer. Will she put her undercover mission with Jack at risk?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walker confronts her painful past while attempting to broker a deal with a German arms dealer. Will she put her undercover mission with Jack at risk?

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 10:00 P.M. - 11:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack goes undercover to retrieve deadly nuclear materials. Meanwhile, it's a political pressure cooker when President Taylor's goodwill is questioned.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack goes undercover to retrieve deadly nuclear materials. Plus, it's a political pressure cooker when President Taylor's goodwill is questioned.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack goes undercover to retrieve deadly nuclear materials. Meanwhile, it's a political pressure cooker when President Taylor's goodwill is questioned.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 11:00 P.M. - 12:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: President Taylor pressurises CTU and Jack's plan has operatives panicked. Meanwhile, as the looming threat intensifies, events take a turn for the worse.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: President Taylor pressurises CTU and Jack's plan has operatives panicked, and as the looming threat intensifies, events take a turn for the worse.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: President Taylor pressurises CTU and Jack's plan has operatives panicked. Meanwhile, as the looming threat intensifies, events take a turn for the worse.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 12:00 A.M. - 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The nation remains vulnerable, but President Taylor presses on with the peace process. Then, as CTU faces failure, the search for someone to blame begins.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: President Taylor presses on with the peace process. Then, as CTU faces failure, the search for someone to blame begins.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The nation remains vulnerable, but President Taylor presses on with the peace process. Then, as CTU faces failure, the search for someone to blame begins.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 1:00 A.M. - 2:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack makes a breakthrough by closing in on a significant individual. Meanwhile, a meeting between President Taylor and Hassan yields surprising results.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack makes a breakthrough by closing in on a significant individual. Plus, a meeting between President Taylor and Hassan yields surprising results.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack makes a breakthrough by closing in on a significant individual. Meanwhile, a meeting between President Taylor and Hassan yields surprising results.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 2:00 A.M. - 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack continues to track the terror suspect. Meanwhile, back at CTU, tensions simmer when parole officer Ben Prady makes an appearance...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack continues to track the terror suspect. Meanwhile, back at CTU, tensions simmer when parole officer Ben Prady makes an appearance...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack continues to track the terror suspect. Meanwhile, back at CTU, tensions simmer when parole officer Ben Prady makes an appearance...

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 3:00 A.M. - 4:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Cole team up to protect New York City from the catastrophic threat. Meanwhile, CTU is further buckled by a hostage situation and Prady's presence.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Cole team up to protect New York City. Meanwhile, CTU is further buckled by a hostage situation and Prady's presence.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 4:00 A.M. - 5:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The NSA make their presence at CTU known as the threat intensifies. Meanwhile, as Dana and Chloe make game-changing moves, Jack heads up a dangerous mission.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 5:00 A.M. - 6:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As the imminent threat of catastrophe crystallises, President Taylor tasks Jack with a crucial mission. Advisor Ethan Kanin also makes a return.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 6:00 A.M. - 7.00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The threat of mass destruction gathers momentum. In a game-changing instalment, President Taylor endures a setback that she may not recover from...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The threat of mass destruction gathers momentum. In a game-changing instalment, President Taylor endures a setback that she may not recover from...

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 7:00 A.M. - 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: An unpredictable eighth season continues to twist and turn. Betrayal is the order of the day as trusted confidantes emerge as enemies of the state.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Former President Logan is back, helping Taylor resuscitate her peace agreement. Meanwhile, Jack makes an emotional move that triggers the unthinkable...

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 9:00 A.M. - 10:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Things get even more personal for Jack when he learns of a devastating development. Trouble looms for President Taylor and her landmark peace agreement too.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: President Taylor presses on with the peace agreement, and Jack calls in a favour before embarking on a crucial mission. Michael Madsen guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: With only a handful of hours remaining, Jack launches a manhunt. Meanwhile, the pivotal peace agreement is rocked by the arrival of undermining forces.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The full-throttle drama hurtles towards its finish line. Fuelled by vengeance, a rogue Jack Bauer continues on his mission, uncovering an unexpected lead.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fuelled by vengeance, a rogue Jack Bauer continues on his mission, uncovering an unexpected lead.

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Just three hours remain of this devastating eighth day and Jack continues his search for the truth. Meanwhile, Chloe leads CTU in a high-stakes operation.

includedAssets.synopsis: President Taylor pushes on with the peace treaty, and Jack takes matters into his own hands...

includedAssets.title: Day 8: 3:00 P.M. - 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Find out what fate awaits the mighty Jack Bauer as the clock ticks down on day eight in this dramatic season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Back with the CTU, Jack must prevent assassinations, battle the mob, defeat terrorists and wage a one-man war to protect his country. Kiefer Sutherland is Jack Bauer in the hit thriller’s eighth season.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Back with the CTU, Jack must wage a one-man war to protect his country. Kiefer Sutherland stars in the hit thriller’s eighth season.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
